name: Mark Scott Johnson
content: Mark Johnson, Macquarie University To remove any frames surrounding this page, click here Mark Johnson Professor of Language Sciences (CORE) School of Computing Faculty of Science Macquarie University Sydney, Australia Chief AI Scientist, Oracle Digital Assistant Oracle Corporation Short CV Contact Information Post-doctoral and Postgraduate (i.e., PhD) student research opportunities Publications Software Slides from talks The Centre for Language Sciences (CLaS) The Centre for Language Technology (CLT) When I'm not working I like to go sailing. Last updated on the 7th December, 2022. Sydney
